teacher_info.intro:
Hello， My name is Fanfei.    I love travelling, enjoy meeting people from different culture background. I have bachelor degree in both microbiology and business management. However my passion is teaching chinese.  
At the beginning I was just teaching Chinese to my international friends and colleagues as a hobby.  Gradually friends and colleagues recommended more and more students to me , as a result I obtained my teaching certificate, and start teaching Chinese in private schools, also as a freelance.

Hello, My name is Jan. I am an engineer and working in Germany. I speak at work and at home almost only German. Sometimes I speak with colleagues and friends in China Madarin or Enlish.  In my free time, I like learning foreign languages for my work and for vacation as well. Jogging, walking and football belongs to my hobbys too. I am a patient and helpful person. I konw how difficult it is to lern foreign languages and specially at the beginning. I would like to help people who are learning Madarin or German and give them my tips to enhance their skills in Mandarin and German efficiently. Furthermore I'm glad to give you my advices, if you begin your life and business in China and Germany,

Hello everyone! I am XIAO from ChangSha. Currently, I live in AnHui. Are you interested in Chinese culture? And often wondering why Chinese people behave & think in different way? Or you need to pass your AP/HSK exams to further your study & career in China? Or would like your children to pick up a new language. I am very delighted and it would be my pleasure to help you reach your objective!
Chinese is always labeled as one of the most difficult languages in the world, but I have to tell you a secret--- actually Chinese is a language which the more you learn the easier it gets. Therefore, we could master it in a fun and simple way by using ......
 如果您要翻译或者中文作业、论文，欢迎咨询我，本人提供各专业论文写作指导服务。

Currently a student of classical literature in France, I am an devout language enthusiast. I have plenty of experience of language learning and it proves to be quite successful, especially about the pronunciation part. I'd love to pass on my passion and knowledge to others alike.

My name is Wu Yingjuan,you can also call me Amy. I am a native Chinese Mandarin Speaker, and Mandarin class B second certified. After a strict selection and training, I became a Chinese teacher in Europe since 2018. My students range from 5yrs old to adults in their 50s. They all passed their HSK tests under my help which give me a lot confidence to be a online teacher. 

I teach Chinese language, Chinese culture and HSK test.  And I am very familiar with the rules of HSK tests, and also if you want to study in China, I also can give you some advice, such like apply for the school and scholarship.

⭐️ 水滴石穿 shuǐdīshíchuān ⭐️ • Constant effort brings success ⭐️

- No refund for missed lessons or more than 20 minutes late.
- The lesson can only be rescheduled or cancelled with 24 hours prior notice.
- Lessons can only be rescheduled once.

Hello, welcome to my page! My name is Brády Jeronimus and I'm a Spanish, Mandarin Chinese and English tutor! ✨
大家好！欢迎来到我的首页哦！我叫叶佳明，我会讲西班牙语，英语与中文 ⭐️
As an avid language learner myself, I know how hard it can be to see any progress. That's why I'm here, not only to teach you an endless number of words and vocabulary, but also to help you understand the language and apply your knowledge to real-life situations.
来和我一起学习哦！再见！
⭐️ I hope to see you soon ⭐️

My name is Sarah and I graduated with a bachelor’s degree in Economics. I'm a native Chinese (Mandarin) speaker born and raised in Beijing China. I love languages and enjoy teaching. Also, I love to travel and watch movies, too. I enjoy spending time with all my family. I have been teaching math for both grade 10&12 students for years in Canada. Also, I have been teaching Mandarin for different ages face to face. I am an outgoing person and like to talk about all different topics with my students, such as food, culture, life and personal goals. 

Send this link to your friends. They can get $10 back after they signing up with this link and buy $20 points.
https://www.italki.com/i/66b6CB?hl=z

Hello, I am Maggie.
 
I am a native speaker and live in South of China. I was a professional Chinese teacher  in a Primary school since I graduated from university, I love my students. After that, I had an opportunity to work in international trade company, so I had been engaged in foreign trade business. During that time, I worked with many foreigners, they always asked me to teach them Chinese, so my students are from all over the world. I really enjoy being a Chinese teacher.
 
I majored in English tour guides during my college, so I love to travel and sports. My favorite sports are hiking and bike riding. I am really good at singing songs, if you like it too, join me.
I am a Mechanical Engineering student in Curtin Malaysia. I love playing basketball during my free time. I speak Chinese(Mandarin) and English.
I love languages. I am Chinese. I can speak Cantonese and Mandarin. I can also speak some English and Japanese. Currently I am learning Thai with my teacher on italki as well.

【关于Grace老师】
·拥有8年全职公立小学语文教学经验。
·母语为普通话专业教师。
·汉语言文学专业毕业。
·持有国家教师资格证，儿童普通话不在话下。
·持有国家普通话证书，拥有清晰标准的发音，且擅长中文朗颂。
·大班课和一对一课面授及网络课程都教过，是专业的中文老师。
·性格活泼开朗，有耐心。

Wei Wei here! I teach English and Mandarin. I am a native Mandarin speaker from Taiwan, speak broadcast standard accent, have a firm command of the English language & speak accent-free American English. I have 15+ years of full-time academic teaching experience & held professorships in three U.S. federal accredited universities. I began to tutor Mandarin to the U.S. diplomats when I was 16 y/o because my mother worked for the State Dept. Also, as a Mandarin teacher. I am great with beginners & kids as I am very patient and love to support your unique interests. If you speak zero or very little Mandarin or English, I can absolutely efficiently communicate w/ you without the language barriers.

Hi.very nice to meet your guys here.First let me introduce myself.My name is Grace. I come from China, I am a native Chinese speaker.My major is Chinese literature. And I am a certificated Chinese teacher with 5 years working experience.I can speak English ,Cantnese,Mandarin.I like travelling and enjoy different countries culture. Of course, I love teaching. I like the feeling when I stand at the stage and give all my knowledge to my students. I am friendly,positive and ambitious .I will share my knowledge and interesting experience with you .Looking forward to our journey of Chinses learning！

Hi, I am Xu Jiangtao. I’m from Shanxi, China, and I’m a Chinese native speaker. 
I’m working in Beijing as a software developer for 6 years, and you must wonder why am I being a language tutor here? Because I love to talk with friends from all over the world. 
I also learning English for a long time, I found the best way to learn a language is to use it, especially for speaking.

Hello everyone, my name is Tess, am a teacher here on italki, I am 28 years old, and I’m from China in Sichuan 2 hours away from Chengdu, which has a vast variety of delicious food and of course pandas. I've been working in English training center for 5 years，I am 28 years old, I have a lots of passions, including traveling, spots and meeting new people, of course  I’m learning languages.

Hi, I'm Keenan,
New Zealand born but grow up in Malaysia. So I have been using Malay, English, Mandarin and Cantonese since I was very young. My passion is learning new languages and hope to use them with the natives as well as teaching what I know to other people. 
I'am here to inspire you to learn new languages and I believe we can do it together.

I am Ironman... No, just kidding. I'm a mobile app developer, project manager, autodidact, designer, chess player, riddler, musician, dietician, sportsman, magician, logician, stand up comedian, ventriloquist, emcee, and ENTJ.

Hi, I'm George and I moved to Canada since I was 6 years old.
English is my mother tongue as it is the first fluent language I speak after moving to Canada.
I love to read books, watch movies, workout, and record music and upload them when I'm free :)

您好, 我是George, 我從6歲就來到加拿大.
英文是我的母語, 因為當我還沒學好中文之前就來到了加拿大. 我是大學音樂系畢業.
我平常有空喜歡看書, 看電影, 健身, 還好錄製音樂、把它放到網路平台去。

Hi my name is Adam and I am from Wellington, New Zealand. English is my first language and my passion.  Dreaming to be a writer, I completed my bachelor degree in English literature and furthered my education in Spain focusing on translating Spanish medieval literature. Alongside my career as a teacher, I have worked as a property auctioneer, appeared in radio shows and am currently working on my first novel.  Being born into a Chinese family,  I also speak fluent mandarin Chinese and have developed an original Chinese teaching method.  Alongside teaching, I am also a keen traveller and a language learner. 
你好， 我的名字叫Adam， 我来自新西兰。 我在一个中国的家庭出身， 所有中文也是我的母语。

Hi, I am Howie and I am a Mandarin teacher for over past 2 years. I graduated in National Taiwan University in Teaching Chinese as a Second Language. I love teaching and I love outdoor activities. I was living in several countries doing Freedive training and Chinese teaching, due to covid-19 I moved back to Malaysia, but still living in an island called Perhentian Island ;) Being a Malaysian-Chinese, I am able to see China & Taiwan in an outsider and insider perspective, I can share you how Chinese speaker think, and compare it with western culture.
